short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the hexagon profile avatars on Twitter back to circles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Those Twitter hexagon avatars are annoying.

This changes them back to circles by recursing down the response body from Twitter API requests, and setting NFT keys back to false.
